accounts crm master list of
customer relationship management crm accounts and List CRM Accounts
section.para: Accounts are central to the CRM. An Account holds information about an entity and serves to define it further as a Customer, Prospect, Vendor, Competitor, or Partner. To access the master list of CRM Accounts, select the "List CRM Accounts" option. The following screen will appear.
The "CRM Accounts" screen displays information on all existing CRM Accounts, including Account number, Account name, and the various possible Account relationships.
